statements: DELETE FROM carbon_emissions WHERE project_name = 'Solar Farm Project';
DELETE FROM RenewableEnergyInitiatives WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM CarbonEmissionReductions WHERE id = 10 AND start_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM RenewableEnergyInitiatives WHERE type = 'Wind' AND capacity > 100
DELETE FROM CarbonReduction WHERE project_name = 'Solar Energy Project';
DELETE FROM EnergySources WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE project_name = 'Solar Park';
DELETE FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'solar' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity < 1000 OR start_date < '2022-01-01';
